description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENTThis requirement is only open to the below list of pre-qualified suppliers under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS). TASK BASED E60ZT-16TSPS / PROFESSIONAL SERVICES REQUIREMENTFILE NUMBER: W8485-TSPS2023-04TIER 1 (< $3.75 M)This requirement is for the Department of National Defence (DND).This requirement is for the:- Stream 1: Human Resources Services Stream- Category 1.2: Organizational Design & Classificationfor the services of:- One (1) Organizational Design & Classification Consultant, IntermediateGSINR019BF: Human Resource Services, Business Consulting/Change Management; Project Management ServicesNumber of Contracts: This bid solicitation is intended to result in the award of one (1) contracts for two (2) years, plus three (3) irrevocable option years allowing Canada to extend the term of the Contract.Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly, from the DND Point of Contact (DND POC), to the Qualified Supply Arrangement Holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement. BIDDERS ARE ADVISED THAT RFP DOCUMENTS ARE NOT AVAILABLE ON THE GOVERNMENT ELECTRONIC TENDERING SYSTEM (https:/ /buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders).Location of Work to be Performed:Region(s): National Capital RegionSpecific Locations: 455 Boulevard de la Carri, Gatineau, QCSecurity Requirement:Security Requirements Check List: Common PS SRCL #20Supplier Security Clearance required: FSC - SecretSecurity Level required (Document Safeguarding): NoneEstimated Level of Effort:The estimated level of effort of the contract will be for 240 days per year.Estimated time frame of contract  - February 1, 2023 to January 31, 2025 plus three (3) irrevocable option years.Enquiries: Enquiries regarding this RFP requirement must be submitted to the DND POC listed below.File Number: W8485-TSPS2023-04DND POC: Khushbu BakshiE-Mail: DapServicesBidReceiving-DoaServicesReceptionDesSoumissions@forces.gc.caDescription of the Requirement:This bid solicitation is being issued to satisfy the requirement of the Department of National Defence for the provision of Task and Solutions Professional Services.The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the services of one (1) Intermediate Organizational Design and Classification (ODC) consultant to support Director Aerospace Equipment Program Management (Maritime) [DAEPM(M)].Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.The TSPS Method of Supply is a result of a formal competitive process which was established as a result of extensive consultations with industry. The Method of Supply provides suppliers with an on-going opportunity to become prequalified for participation in future bidding opportunities. full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Invitation to Bid - Organizational Design and Classification Consultant, Intermediate

### Notice of Proposed Procurement

The Government of Canada invites eligible bidders to submit a proposal for two (2) years, plus three (3) irrevocable option years, to provide Organizational Design and Classification Consultant services to the Department of National Defence (DND).

### Background Information

This requirement is a result of the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) initiative, a formal competitive process established to provide suppliers with ongoing opportunities to become pre-qualified for participation in future bidding opportunities.

### Key Requirements

* Provide Organizational Design and Classification Consultant services to support DND
* Estimated level of effort: 240 days per year
* Estimated contract duration: 2 years, plus 3 option years
* Key competencies:
	+ Human Resource Services
	+ Business Consulting/Change Management
	+ Project Management Services

### Instructions to Bidder

* This solicitation is open only to the list of pre-qualified suppliers under E60ZT-16TSPS
* Bidders must submit their proposal electronically to the designated contact
* RFP documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System

### Contact Information

* Designated Contact: Khushbu Bakshi
* Email: DapServicesBidReceiving-DoaServicesReceptionDesSoumissions@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: [Not Available]
* Fax: [Not Available]

### Notice of Amendment

This solicitation supersedes the notice published on December 19, 2022.

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: January 17, 2023 at 14:00:00 (ET)
* Amendment Date: January 5, 2023

### Trade Agreements

This procurement falls under the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Regions of Opportunity

This solicitation is open to suppliers based in the National Capital Region (NCR) only.

### Targeted
